title: The Emperor’s Favorite Imperial Concubine is an O - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Historical   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient Times   Animal Characteristics   Black Belly   Child Abuse   Couple Growth   Cute Children   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Mpreg   Omegaverse   Past Plays a Big Role   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel   Tragic Past   Transmigration
author: Gu Zhijun   顾之君
description:
In the interstellar era, Wen Mingyu is an Omega who unexpectedly crossed over to the ancient Blue Star and was offered as a sacrifice to the tyrant.

Everyone thought he would die soon.

But—

Smelling the faint tempting scent, the tyrant embraced the person in his arms, and his heart full of anger and restlessness gradually sank to rest.

Tyrant: “What kind of incense did this concubine use?

Wen Mingyu felt weak all over: “…” This Alpha’s pheromone is too oppressive.

Afterwards.

Wen Minyu saw the large shadow swaying behind the tyrant’s back.

Stuttering with fright—“Th-This… this is a dragon tail?!”>
